item.title: By: SQLDenis
item.dc:creator: SQLDenis
item.content:encoded:
Wizards can be good and bad..I always remember trying to modify a view with a CASE statement in design view…would blow up

It doesn’t blow up on 2008 but it is still not perfect,

Take this silly example

CREATE VIEW v_test
AS
SELECT CASE A WHEN 1 THEN ‘One’
ELSE ‘Not One’ END AS bla
FROM(
SELECT 1 AS A
UNION ALL
SELECT 2 ) x

here it thinks that the CASE statement is a column name
